page.title: 12Middlewood Station.
page.content: {Middlewood station}is rather unusual as there is no road leading to it. It is a ten minute walk to{High {Lane}and there are no signposts giving directions. The station is covered in litter, and the paint is flaking, but the graffiti is kept back and the station is set in beautiful surroundings. There is one train every hour through the day and extra ones in rush hours. The trains serve {Hazel Grove,Manchester,Stockport}to the North.{Disley, New Mills,Whaley {Bridge and Buxton}to the South. A return ticket from Manchester to Middlewood in 2nd class is Â£1.17. The first train is before 7 am and the last train is after 11 pm, so there is always transport for the early birds and the late ones home.
